name: Better Withered Mobs
description: This mod adds Withered Bones, Withered Bone Meal, Withered Bone Blocks, a Potion of Decay, and a Withering enchantment! Wither Skeletons spawn with swords with the Withering enchantment of a random level (This can be disabled in the config). Withered mobs no longer drop regular Bones and only drop Withered Bones (This can be disabled in the config).
